details.description: Developed real-time operations functionality and API development involving warehouse management, expanding the system's overall scope and allowing for more comprehensive data statistical analysis
Executed RCAs for discrepancies in underlying system and fixed core issues, cutting the number of operational difficulties with a warehouse in half
Interacted with different teams to understand the precise scope of development from front-end to back-end and implemented it accordingly by guiding relevant teams to align with current development
Achieved mastery over Spring Boot framework and MySQL while working on developing warehouse systems
Conducted dense captioning on videos with transformer-based models known for superior learning capabilities

Produced high-quality captions from respective events in videos by employing a pre-trained bi-modal transformer model that takes both audio and videos as features from sample videos for dense captioning in videos
